description: The test resource allows StatusCake tests to be managed by Terraform.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

BasicPass.description: If BasicUser is set then this should be the password for the BasicUser.

BasicUser.description: A Basic Auth User account to use to login.

Branding.description: Set to 0 to use branding (default) or 1 to disable public reporting branding).

CheckRate.description: Test check rate in seconds. Defaults to 300.

Confirmations.description: The number of confirmation servers to use in order to detect downtime. Defaults to 0.

ContactGroup.description: Set test contact groups, must be array of strings.

ContactId.description: **Deprecated** (Optional) The id of the contact group to be added to the test. Each test can have only one.

CustomHeader.description: Custom HTTP header, must be supplied as JSON.

DoNotFind.description: If the above string should be found to trigger a alert. 1 = will trigger if find_string found.

EnableSslAlert.description: HTTP Tests only. If enabled, tests will send warnings if the SSL certificate is about to expire. Paid users only. Default is false.

FinalEndpoint.description: Use to specify the expected Final URL in the testing process.

FindString.description: A string that should either be found or not found.

FollowRedirect.description: Use to specify whether redirects should be followed, set to true to enable. Default is false.

LogoImage.description: A URL to a image to use for public reporting.

NodeLocations.description: Set test node locations, must be array of strings.

Paused.description: Whether or not the test is paused. Defaults to false.

PingUrl.description: A URL to ping if a site goes down.

Port.description: The port to use when specifying a TCP test.

PostRaw.description: Use to populate the RAW POST data field on the test.

Public.description: Set 1 to enable public reporting, 0 to disable.

RealBrowser.description: Use 1 to TURN OFF real browser testing.

TestTags.description: Set test tags, must be array of strings.

TestType.description: The type of Test. Either HTTP, TCP, PING, or DNS.

Timeout.description: The timeout of the test in seconds.

TriggerRate.description: The number of minutes to wait before sending an alert. Default is `5`.

UseJar.description: Set to true to enable the Cookie Jar. Required for some redirects. Default is false.

UserAgent.description: Test with a custom user agent set.

Virus.description: Enable virus checking or not. 1 to enable.

WebsiteHost.description: Used internally, when possible please add.

WebsiteName.description: This is the name of the test and the website to be monitored.

WebsiteUrl.description: The URL of the website to be monitored.
